title: Torn Desires
description: PART 2 BBW Vampire Serial  Zane is ruthless, a killer. News is out that he has brutally murdered his chosen female. The heartless vampire king has called Mate’s Lore, the blood of his bride still wet on his hands.  This terrifying news means that Tanya will have to spend equal time with both kings until the new moon. Only when the night sky is at its darkest will she be permitted to choose her future mate even though she knows her place is at Brant’s side.  She must somehow find the strength to survive the next twenty four hours with Zane if she has any hope of making it to new moon. Might as well be a freaking lifetime…  Torn Desires is Part 2 of a 6 part serial and is approximately 19,000 words/76 pages. The story contains strong sexual themes/language and is not intended for readers under the age of 18. M/F/M
author: Charlene Hartnady
